amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike sections in the bill that allows oil drilling in the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 108-69 to strike the provision in the bill authorizing the Interior Department to grant leases for oil and gas exploration, development, and production in the Arctic National Wildlife Refuge in Alaska.
